title: Newlyweds Kate and Rio Ferdinand look happy in love in new BTS of lavish wedding
text:
The pair married at the end of September (Picture: @xkateferdinand/Instagram)

Rio and Kate Ferdinand have got fans jumping for joy as they reveal more beautiful behind-the-scene moments from their wedding ceremony.

Kate, 28, took to Instagram to show pictures of her and former footballer husband Rio, 40, looking so damn in love with each other and we’re filled with awe.

The Ferdinand’s shared some pictures of the two holding on to each other as they laughed away at some inside jokes.

‘Reminiscing on the best brunch with our family & friends,’ Kate wrote on Instagram as she continued to share their private moments.

One photo had the Ferdinand’s posing with the one and only Nusret Gökçe aka Salt Bae and we’re only slightly jealous.

The couple and their friends and family had the time of their lives as they danced and drank their pre-wedding brunch away.

Advertisement

Our favourite photo, however, is of the former TOWIE star Kate walking down the aisle with Rio’s two sons – Tate, 11, and Lorenz, 13 – from his previous relationship with late wife Rebecca Ellison.

What’s so funny? (Picture: @xkateferdinand/ Instagram)

Kate captioned the heart-warming photo: ‘There were so many special moments at our wedding ….. but this is one I will never forget #proud #myboys’ along with a love heart.

Rio reposted his wife’s photo, captioning it: ‘Wedding day. My 2 boys walking my wife to be down the aisle. Warmed my heart this….’

We’re not crying, you’re crying.

Recently, Kate father has awkwardly mentioned that he walked his daughter down the aisle as she married Rio, following years of a strained relationship.

Uh, did she walk down the aisle twice?

It was a particularly special momentous occasion for Kate’s father Phil Wright, as he was able to see his daughter get married despite previous tensions between them.

Speaking to the Sun On Sunday about the wedding, Phil explained: ‘It was an amazing wedding and I felt very proud.

‘There has been a lot of emotion all round . . . it’s been a mad few days.’

Kate has previously spoken of her ‘upset’ with her father after she wasn’t invited to one of his weddings when she was aged just nine-years-old.

Addressing the situation, Phil said: ‘It wasn’t just Kate that was upset she didn’t go to my wedding. I was not allowed to invite her.

‘But it was never awkward between me and Kate, it was awkward between me and her mother.’
